overview:
Ashwin Srivastava graduated from IIT Bombay and is currently the CEO of Incept. He manages the daily operations of the company and also heads the Business Strategy and Marketing divisions.

He is also a guest faculty at the Incept Training Academy, claimed to be India’s first Certificate Training Academy on Biometrics & Surveillance.

Ashwin graduated from IIT Bombay after completing his bachelors and masters from the college, and has been a serial entrepreneur ever since.
